name: Fleeing Felines: The Cat Escape
storyline: We live in a far future. The last human civilizations died millennia ago and on its ruins, hybrids of man and beast reside. They built new kingdoms. In a far land, the dangerous rat army rose to power, controlled by a wicked witch. They sought dangerous ancient, forbidden cybertechnology and started to build a machine empire. They started to conquer land by land. Just a princess and a treasure hunter are willing to fight back.
